hooks.command: words=(\"discipline\" \"focus\" \"wisdom\" \"courage\" \"virtue\" \"justice\" \"fortitude\" \"temperance\" \"resilience\" \"integrity\" \"perseverance\" \"tranquility\" \"mastery\" \"excellence\" \"purpose\" \"determination\" \"sovereignty\" \"transcendence\" \"mindfulness\" \"strength\"); word=${words[$RANDOM % ${#words[@]}]}; if command -v say >/dev/null 2>&1; then say \"$word\"; elif command -v espeak >/dev/null 2>&1; then espeak \"$word\"; elif command -v spd-say >/dev/null 2>&1; then spd-say \"$word\"; else echo \"$word\"; fi
